title: Subpart 80-1 - GENERAL REQUIREMENTS FOR TEACHERS' CERTIFICATES
content:
Subpart 80-1 - GENERAL REQUIREMENTS FOR TEACHERS' CERTIFICATES
State Regulations
§ 80-1.1 - Application of this Subpart and definitions
§ 80-1.2 - Applications and certificates, dates of issuance
§ 80-1.3 - Citizenship
§ 80-1.4 - Required study in child abuse identification and reporting, and school violence prevention and intervention
§ 80-1.5 - Examinations for certification
§ 80-1.6 - Extensions of time validity of certificates
§ 80-1.7 - Renewal of a provisional certificate
§ 80-1.8 - Reissuance of an initial certificate
§ 80-1.9 - Filing of personnel data
§ 80-1.10 - Out-of-state credentials
§ 80-1.11 - Criminal history record check
§ 80-1.12 - Required study in the needs of students with autism for certificates in certain classroom teaching titles
§ 80-1.13 - Required study in harassment, bullying and discrimination prevention and intervention

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
